channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Northeast gets last brunt of winter storm that brought ice, snow, cold to much of the US
item.description: The Northeastern U.S. is getting the last brunt of a massive winter storm that dumped snow, sleet and ice across much of the southern and eastern U.S. over the weekend.

item.title: More than 11,400 flights canceled Sunday as massive winter storm sweeps across US
